html:
** Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN.O opens 37% above IPO price in the biggest U.S. new issue of the year

** EV maker, backed by Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Ford Motor Co F.N, sold 153 mln shares at $78 in upsized IPO, raising ~$12 bln (Full Story)

** If full over-allotment is exercised, the Tesla TSLA.O rival could reap $13.7 bln

** Amazon, T. Rowe Price, Franklin Templeton, Capital Research and Blackstone among a group of "cornerstone investors" who indicated to buy up to $5 bln of the IPO, per the prospectus filing

** Morgan Stanley, Goldman and JP Morgan leading 22-firm underwriting group for the IPO


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

(( lance.tupper.tr.com@reuters.net
lance.tupper@tr.com 1-332-219-1430) )
